issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.6.0 + all supported iOS devices.

1.BaseUI > TableViews > TableView > Table View (layout 2)
2.tap into search bar
3.tap cancel while looking at the calender items (icon and "posted")

results these tiems flash/seem to animate

This was missed in 1.6.0 all supported devices, regression from 1.5.1

{html}
fields.summary: iOS, Dismissing search bar/keyboard redraws some row items (calender items)

comments.body: Closing ticket as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
